attributes.action: Reintroduce half fare on all public transport for under 16's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I grew up paying half fare on the buses and trains.
If people choose to have children then they should also pay their fares.
We are in a recession and since the introduction of free travel for under 16's, they jump on and off of buses abuse other passengers and are a drain on the taxpayers.
Usually children attend a local school and there is no reason why they cannot walk !
I also think cars should be banned for a mile radius from any school to stop congestion and overweight children.
